content: Ugh, as an indie musician myself. This one hits it on the nail. I wish I could pay every artist I’ve ever worked with though. So much talent in the world.. and not enough pie. It’s ironic though; the projects I do for money — I don’t care alot for. The ones I do for free- are the ones that matter the most. Guess I’ve had to learn over the years to separate music that is business, and music that is artistry. One pays the pills, and the other is the only one I actually give a fuck about so I don’t even think about money. However; you’re right. We’re all screwed in thousands of ways, but, there is always a solution and I’m sure you’re not far from it. Thanks for the read, ‘marketing scum’. Hahaha, that is hilarious btw. Jokes aside; 5 minutes of my life well and truly spent. Cheers.
